body_html:
tf_cnn_benchmarks/tf_cnn_benchmarks.py --model resnet50 --batch_size 64 --num_batches 50 --data_format=NCHW --local_parameter_device cpu --num_inter_threads 0

Besides, I refer from the benchmark links: https://www.tensorflow.org/performance/benchmarks#details_for_nvidia_dgx-1tm_nvidia_tesla_p100

which says inceptionV3 can have a 569 images/sec using P100 x 4 (parameter on cpu), and I have the same hardware configuration but I can never get this speed (it only reaches 490 images/sec). So can you also show how to make it 569 images/sec using P100 x 4 (parameter on cpu), any special configurations?

body:
`tf_cnn_benchmarks/tf_cnn_benchmarks.py --model resnet50 --batch_size 64 --num_batches 50 --data_format=NCHW --local_parameter_device cpu --num_inter_threads 0`

Besides, I refer from the benchmark links: https://www.tensorflow.org/performance/benchmarks#details_for_nvidia_dgx-1tm_nvidia_tesla_p100

which says inceptionV3 can have a 569 images/sec using P100 x 4 (parameter on cpu), and I have the same hardware configuration but I can never get this speed (it only reaches 490 images/sec). So can you also show how to make it 569 images/sec using P100 x 4 (parameter on cpu), any special configurations?
